attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prevent a ban on the sales, manufacture and use of electronic dog training collars. Recognise that an electronic training collar when used correctly saves many dogs each year.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "save Electronic Dog Training Collars."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13018.asp

Prime Minister's Office
